Package index

Wrapper functions

Functions around individual endpoint in the Bluesky Social API

get_token()
Get token for Bluesky api
refresh_token()
Refresh token for Bluesky api
verify_token()
Verify token
get_profiles()
Get profile for an actor/actors with improved error handling
get_follows()
Get follows for an actor with improved error handling
follow_actor()
Follow an actor or actors
get_follows_old()
Get follows for an actor
get_profiles_old()
Get profile for an actor/actors

Network functions

Functions for creating and analyzing networks.

add_metrics()
Add selected network metrics to actors
build_network()
Build a complete network and helpful artifacts
com_labels()
Label communities
create_widget()
Create a 3d-widget
expand_net()
Expand network
init_net()
Create initial network
trim_net()
Trim network
word_freqs()
Word frequencies
